title: Contemporary Waterfront Stay Less than an Hour from Perth
description: Enjoy a waterfront break at The Sebel Mandurah, set right in the heart of the gorgeous coastal town just 50 minutes' drive from Perth. Its fantastic location offers beautiful views of Mandjar Bay with local attractions and a large variety of cafés and restaurants within walking distance. During your stay, you’ll enjoy daily buffet breakfast, guaranteed late 1pm check out and a welcome bottle of wine on arrival. Plus, one child under the age of 11 stays free!

title: Coastal Mandurah Getaway with Daily Breakfast & Lagoon Pool
description: Experience the perfect coastal retreat on Western Australia’s breathtaking southern shore with a stay at this Mandurah getaway, just moments from the lively foreshore. Spend your days unwinding in the hotel’s multistorey atrium, featuring a lagoon pool, jacuzzi, restaurant and bar. Wander over to the marina to watch the boats drift by, dine at a local restaurant, play a round on the onsite tennis courts or simply savour the cool sea breeze. With spacious, light-filled rooms and Mandurah’s best attractions just a short stroll away, you’re set for an ideal getaway.
offer_address: 65 Ormsby Terrace, Mandurah, Western Australia 6210, Australia

title: Stylish Waterfront Sebel Mandurah Stay Just One Hour from Perth
description:
Pack your bags and escape to the picturesque waters of Mandjar Bay with a luxurious stay at The Sebel Mandurah, just a one-hour drive from Perth. Set right in the heart of this gorgeous coastal town and surrounded by breathtaking beaches, lakes and inlets, The Sebel Mandurah's fantastic location on the esplanade offers beautiful waterfront views and alfresco restaurants, theatres, museums and more on the doorstep.

Admire local wildlife on a dolphin cruise, swing into your stay at The Cut Golf Course, or stretch your legs on a hike through Yalgorup National Park. When you're done exploring, return to your comfortable base at The Sebel Mandurah - a winner in the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Awards 2021 - where peaceful water views, plush beds and friendly service await.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Toast your escape with one cocktail per person at Peninsula Bar and Restaurant
- Takeaway breakfast pack with a coffee, pastry and bottle of water each
- End your stay with a cosy sleep-in and 12pm late checkout

**Water-view upgrade available**: Take in peaceful water views over Mandjar Bay from your private balcony when you upgrade to the Superior King Water-View Room.

title: Contemporary Waterfront Hotel Stay near Perth with Cocktails
description:
Enjoy a waterfront break at The Sebel Mandurah, set right in the heart of the gorgeous coastal town just 50 minutes' drive from Perth. Its fantastic location offers beautiful views of Mandjar Bay with top attractions and a large variety of cafés and restaurants within walking distance. Meet local wildlife on a dolphin cruise, play The Cut Golf Course, hike in Yalgorup National Park, admire the thrombolites at Lake Clifton or take a quick drive into Perth for shopping and fine dining.

When you're done exploring, return to your comfortable base at The Sebel Mandurah, where peaceful water views, plush beds and friendly service await.

title: Beachfront Apartment Stay near Perth with Spectacular Views
description:
Set on the shores of Comet Bay, surrounded by the Indian Ocean and glittering waters of Dolphin Quay on the Mandurah Ocean Marina, Seashells Mandurah is an ode to beachfront living. Only an hour's drive from Perth and brimming with waterfront restaurants, sprawling waterways, long stretches of coastline and winding wilderness trails, this charming resort town invites you to discover a place with perpetual summer vibes.

Enjoy a welcome bottle of wine on arrival, onsite parking, complimentary movies on demand and guaranteed 11am checkout.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the spacious Two-Bedroom Apartment for four people.

title: Mandurah Beach Break: Breakfast, Wine and More
description: Enjoy a break at The Sebel Mandurah, set right in the heart of the gorgeous coastal town, just an hour outside of Perth. Its fantastic location offers beautiful views of Mandjar Bay, with local attractions and a large variety of cafés and restaurants within walking distance. During your stay you’ll enjoy daily cooked breakfasts and wine on arrival. Plus, one child under the age of 11 stays free!

title: Award-Winning Mandurah Beachfront Apartment Escape
description:
Set on the shores of Comet Bay, boasting spectacular views over the Indian Ocean and the glittering waters of Dolphin Quay on Mandurah Ocean Marina, Seashells Mandurah is the perfect destination for a WA beach escape.

It’s no wonder this award-winning property is currently ranked #1 in Mandurah on Tripadvisor: the resort boasts direct beach access, an infinity pool right at the beach’s edge, a selection of contemporary and spacious self-contained apartments, a BBQ terrace and tennis courts. Next door is an organic eco-spa right and there is more than 60 kilometres of pristine coastline, dozens of nature parks and walking trails as your playground.

title: Mandurah Comet Bay Beachfront Apartments with Marina Views
description:
Set on the shores of Comet Bay, surrounded by the Indian Ocean and glittering waters of Dolphin Quay on the Mandurah Ocean Marina, Seashells Mandurah is an ode to beachfront living. Only an hour's drive from Perth and brimming with waterfront restaurants, sprawling waterways, long stretches of coastline and winding wilderness trails, this charming resort town invites you to discover a place with perpetual summer vibes.

Do as much or as little as you like, coming and going from your apartment as you please. Mandurah's restaurants and bars are at your fingertips should you choose, or you'll have a full kitchen at your disposal for laidback evenings at your accommodation. There's also a communal BBQ area, perfect for balmy beachfront evenings. Lounge beside the infinity-edge pool or venture further afield for waterside walks and nature park trails - this is easy breezy coastal living at its best.

title: Elegant Waterfront Mandurah Escape near Perth with Outdoor Pool
description:
Fall in love with the tranquil charms of Western Australia's Mandurah from this sophisticated stay overlooking the serene waters of Mandjar Bay. Only an hour's drive from Perth, the property boasts elegantly appointed rooms and self-contained apartments, perfect for family and friends.

Spend your days lounging by the hotel's pool, curled up with a book, take leisurely strolls along the esplanade or head out on an adventurous cruise and get a chance to spot playful bottlenose dolphins. Surrounded by breathtaking beaches, lakes and inlets of the Mandurah-Peel region, the hotel acts as the ideal launchpad for all explorations. Plus, it also offers a vast array of alfresco waterfront restaurants, theatres and museums right on its doorstep.
offer_address: 1 Marco Polo Drive, Mandurah, Western Australia 6210, Australia
